action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows a library with wooden tables and chairs. There are bookshelves filled with books in the background. A small object is placed on one of the tables in the foreground.

ANSWER: The image shows a library setting with wooden tables and chairs, bookshelves filled with books, and a small object on one of the tables.
action.label: response

action.content: guide

Here is the description of what the Escape Room looks like:  description: the image shows a library with wooden tables and chairs. there are bookshelves filled with books in the background. a small object is placed on one of the tables in the foreground.

answer: the image shows a library setting with wooden tables and chairs, bookshelves filled with books, and a small object on one of the tables
